general.result: User should consent to the data we need access to and be redirected to our app's terms of service page.

general.scenario: User loads into app for the first time or before accepting our terms of service
general.result: User should be presented with our terms of service.

general.scenario: User loads into app (after terms of service agreement)
general.result: User should see landing page with drop zone. Redux should have their store information when sockets connect.

landing.scenario: User drops a compatible .csv file that does not require mapping into the drop zone
landing.result: User should be brought to Verify Import or shown the Upload Consent Modal

landing.scenario: User drops a compatible .csv file that does require mapping into the drop zone
landing.data: Any .csv file with extra or missing headers
landing.result: User should be brought to the Mapping screen

landing.scenario: User drops a .csv file that will not meet requirements even after mapping
landing.data: Any .csv file with extra or missing headers
landing.result: User should be brought to the Mapping screen

landing.scenario: User drops a filetype other than a .csv into the dropzone
landing.result: User should be see an error above the drop zone prompting for the use of a .csv

landing.scenario: User clicks on Create Template button
landing.result: User should see a modal allowing them to download a template file.

landing.scenario: User creates a template and attempts download
landing.result: User should be prompted to downlaod their created file.

mapping.scenario: In defining an unknown header, user selects a required or optional field
mapping.result: Namespace and Value Type inputs should disappear

mapping.scenario: In defining an unknown header, user edits Namespace or Value Type metafield options
mapping.result: A warning should appear next to the continue button prompting the user to save changes.

mapping.scenario: In defining an unknown header, user edits Namespace or Value Type metafield options
mapping.result: A warning should appear next to the continue button prompting the user to save changes.

mapping.scenario: From an empty state, the value of Mapping Name is updated
mapping.result: A warning should appear next to the continue button prompting the user to save changes.

mapping.scenario: From an empty state, the value of Mapping Name is updated and at least one Unknown Header value is edited.
mapping.result: A warning should appear next to the continue button prompting the user to save changes, and a cutton should appear on the left side of the UI that allows users to save and continue.
